title: Research data quality: assistant-json, user-question, user-code
description: Analyze samples of assistant-json, user-question, user-code. For each type: extract samples, score relevance, recommend handling strategy.

acceptanceCriteria.text: Paper 1 (assistant-json): Extract 5+ samples of 'assistant-json' from ~/.claude/projects/ JSONL files
Paper 1 (assistant-json): Analyze each sample - is it useful for search? Score 1-5 relevance
Paper 2 (user-question): Extract 5+ samples of 'user-question' from ~/.claude/projects/ JSONL files
Paper 2 (user-question): Analyze each sample - is it useful for search? Score 1-5 relevance
Paper 3 (user-code): Extract 5+ samples of 'user-code' from ~/.claude/projects/ JSONL files
Paper 3 (user-code): Analyze each sample - is it useful for search? Score 1-5 relevance
